966695824741806080.text:
TEZOS ACHIEVES IMPORTANT MILESTONE
After months of very hard work under extremely difficult conditions, I'm very happy that we've achieved a good resolution that optimally serves the interests of the Tezos project and the wider crypto ecosystem.
https://tezosfoundation.ch/news/tezos-board-reorganized/ …

954452971689005056.text: We look forward to working with the global community to build Tezos into a success story. While the board will be primarily Swiss, the executive team, advisors, and developers will be sourced globally. We invite you to help us find the most talented people passionate about Tezos.

954338290366320640.text: To be clear: the Tezos Foundation is a Swiss foundation, based in Crypto Valley, Switzerland, and its top leadership teams will be heavily Swiss-weighted. Physical proximity and cultural fit is especially important initially, to build trust and productive working relationships.

954336650389348352.text: The most important category is the executive team — because that's where the action is.

954336291637878784.text:
Now that we have regained the ability to act, the Tezos Foundation is building a world-class team to execute its mission. We are recruiting proven achievers in three categories: 1. board 2. advisors 3. executive team.
Complemented by top-tier professional service providers.

954334947963297804.text:
Best practices start with good people.
With good people, there’s no limit to the heights you can achieve.
Without good people, all the other best practices will ultimately fail.
— Johann Gevers

954334144124813313.text:
Building a startup is like staring into the abyss of death and eating glass.
—Elon Musk

954333877329330176.text:
The prerequisite for integrity? ► Emotional maturity and impulse control.
Without maturity and impulse control, we cannot act wisely — especially when things get difficult.
Startups are extremely difficult environments.

954333227900170240.text: Warren Buffett is a matchless picker of superior managers. He looks for three qualities: 1. integrity 2. intelligence 3. energy — in that order. Because without integrity, intelligence and energy will kill you.

954332187649871872.text:
For those seeking to understand what happened at Tezos — both its successes and its failures:
"In a high-trust environment, the impossible becomes possible.
In a low-trust environment, even the possible becomes impossible."
— Johann Gevers
